title: An Unknown Error has Occured. (disables my friendslist so I cannot spectate or chat.)
body:
today there was a patch when i got back from school not the new patch just a small one and now i cant see my friendslist.

pls help.

replies.body: There was an issue with chat servers overnight per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Everything looks to be okay now.  Let me know!
